About EduPortal

Transforming Education with Technology and Passion

🎯 Our Mission

To make quality education accessible and affordable to every student, anywhere in the world.

🌟 Our Vision

To become the leading global platform for online learning, skill development, and career growth.

📌 Why Choose EduPortal?

Expert Instructors

Learn from industry professionals and experienced mentors.

Flexible Learning

Study at your own pace with 24/7 access to all courses.

Certifications

Earn verified certificates to boost your resume and career.

👨‍🏫 Meet Our Team

Dr. Riya Sharma

Founder & CEO PhD in Education Technology

Ankit Verma

CTO - Full Stack Developer & EdTech Expert

Pooja Mehta

COO - Strategic Planner & Operations Head
